text: Granulifusus faurei is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies.Bouchet, P. (2011). Granulifusus faurei (Barnard, 1959). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=577359 on 2012-02-20 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Marais J.P. & R.N. Kilburn (2010) Fasciolariidae. pp. 106–137, in: Marais A.P. & Seccombe A.D. (eds), Identification guide to the seashells of South Africa. Volume 1. Groenkloof: Centre for Molluscan Studies. 376 pp ==External links== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1959
title: Granulifusus faurei
